storyInfo:
After the fight, Gavial realizes she is up against the minions of an old acquaintance. Then, the aircraft's engine is stolen.
That's when Tomimi, a girl who worships the ground Gavial walks on, appears. The party decides to split up.

attributes.content: Cue. Titecuani! She... she's something.
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Whaddaya know, you guys are pretty strong! Shame you had to run into me, Gavial!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Wait... wait, what did you say your name was?
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Ga-vi-al!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial?!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Wait! Look close! That face, that hair! You're Gavial, aren't you?!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: I feel like I just said I was!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: It-It's Gavial! Gavial's back! Brothers! Go, hurry! Tell Clan Leader Eunectes!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: What? Eunectes? Hey! Get back here!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Tch. Ran off.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Thank goodness! If you'd been just a little later, they would've taken me.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Where's our pilot guy? Uh, his name, uh, Dylan! Where's Dylan?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: He tried to fight some of the Archosauria in the middle of it all. They knocked him out.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Oh! Gavial, I found Dylan here!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Good. Drag him over. I'll take a look at the damage.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Say, Lancet-2, you can fix this aircraft, right?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes! Closure input lots of aircraft knowledge into me before we left.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: In principle, following a successful emergency landing, the tools provided should be sufficient for a repair.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Only...
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Kay, I asked you to drag him over, not to LITERALLY drag him over.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Oh. Sorry.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: ...Looks like they didn't get any kills on us, huh? Wow, who knew this guy's underwear would be so gaudy... heh. Yeah, let him have his beauty sleep and he'll wake himself up.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Lancet-2, you were saying? Only what?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Only, the Archosauria we just met stole the engine.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Hah? The engine?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Correct. Before they noticed me, I sighted them from the deck. They found the aircraft's engine, pulled it out, and carried it away with them.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Come see for yourself.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Hoo, boy. Yeah, that's a hole. I don't really get how these things actually work, but, uh, I'm guessing this means it won't fly now?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes, it won't fly now.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Oh? Doctor, you don't look too good.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.options: None of this looks too good.;......;Kal'tsit's gonna kill me!

attributes.content: A short while back
A letter?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yeah. From my homeland. They're holding the Mahuizzotia again soon.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: 'Mahuizzotia.' Strength and honor?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Huh, you know it? Yeah, it's what they call the ceremony where they choose the next Great Chief.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I haven't heard anyone use that language in a long time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As I recall, though, you left your homeland and then came to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yeah, but there’s this li’l kid I knew who still keeps in touch with me. She’s the one who sent the letter.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I also recall you saying that you left because you were ostracized. If so, the election of the chief shouldn't concern you at all.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yeah... hell, no, I'm not going out to be the next Great Chieftain. Just, the brat seems like she really wants me to come back for a bit, and I haven't been back in a bit, and...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Homesickness?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Maybe a little, yeah.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: And why are you requesting to bring Dr. {@nickname}? From a biological standpoint, the Doctor couldn't pass for one of you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Doctor's been working so hard, y'know? I figured it'd be a nice little vacation.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: And what was the purpose of this aircraft requisition form, Blaze?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Gavial's old place is way out in the middle of nowhere Sargon! Who'd walk that far?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: So instead of walking, you want to use a low-altitude aircraft and risk detection by the Sargon authorities.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Wait, lemme explain! When I say nowhere, I mean we looked at the maps and Gavial's is one of the lest densely populated regions of Sargon. From the intel we've gathered, Sargon doesn't even station any forces there.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You're correct that the region is Sargon's in name only. You've done your homework.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And now, seeing as you've made all your plans, why have you come to me?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: B-Because any and all paperwork passes through you...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Are we good or not, Kal'tsit? If not, we'll forget it and move on.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: (Quietly) Doctor, maybe we should just call it off. There's no way Kal'tsit's gonna agree...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Fine. I've approved it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Seriously?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Gavial, you've never properly introduced us to your hometown before.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And considering your standing as a core member of Rhodes Island, and the initiative you showed in making this proposal, we can afford to grant Dr. {@nickname} this leave, given accompaniment by an elite operator.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That's what I like to hear!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Further, I will treat this operation as an on-site field investigation. You may freely select any off-duty operators.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Amiya has been very busy as of late. She is not allowed to go, whether she wants to or not. You will have to tell her this yourself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Keep in mind that you are technically entering Sargon territory. Rhodes Island has very few offices in Sargon. Don't make trouble for yourselves, or for Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Further, Rhodes Island's low-altitude aircraft are tremendously important to us, and Sargon is a rough environment. I trust you to bring the vehicle back safe and sound, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ohhh. Now that you mention it, yeah, that sounds about right.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hey, relax, Doctor! This is my homeland. I know it like the back of my hand. Lancet-2, we've just gotta find the kiddos who stole the engine and steal it right back, yeah?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes... They definitely seemed to have some understanding of technology, at least. They hardly damaged anything else in the removal process.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: In the event we do get the engine back, I should be able to guide you through reinstallation.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: On that note, there's some emergency maintenance I must carry out before any of this ends up exploding. Please hold...
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Huh? Them? Technology? First I've heard of any of us getting along with technology. We're all knuckleheads by nature.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Specifically, only enough to know how to pull out the pipes and cables, but...
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: ...Wait, hold on. I bet if they're her minions...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial, I'm hungry!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: All our food reserves should be fine, right?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: They should be fine, yes.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: But some systems were damaged by the emergency landing. The storage compartment is currently sealed. I'll need some time to unlock it again...
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Hang in there a little longer, then, Kay.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But I'm hungry nowww!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Fine, then. Let's go and...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gaaaaviiiiaaaaal!
Huh? Oh, crud. I know that voice.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Wow, Gavial! You're actually here!
Gavial, your hair's gotten long!
Gavial, your clothes look really good!
Gavial, you have a weapon now! How come? It doesn't look very good for hitting people!
Gurgh! Yes, Tomimi, it's me, you're not imagining it. Just let go of me first!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Gavial, have you been eating okay out there?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Did you really become a doctor?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: ...*Sigh* What are you doing here, Tomimi?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: So I saw a thing fall out of the sky, and I went to see what it was, and then I saw you!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Oh, is your disease thing better yet? I read that people outside can get Stone Disease really bad. Are you okay?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I'm fine, I'm fine. Never better.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial! You're really back!
attributes.name: Archosauria

attributes.content: It's good to see you alive and well after all, Gavial!
attributes.name: Archosauria

attributes.content: No mistake, you need to be our next Great Chief!
attributes.name: Archosauria

attributes.content: Dream on. I'm only on leave. Came back to see how things are going.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.options: Gavial, didn't you say you were ostracized from your tribe?

attributes.content: Yeah. Why?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial, who-who is this person?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Huh? Tomimi, you can speak standard Sargonian now? Pretty fluently too.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yep! I learned it just so I could speak with you, Gavial!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Not bad. I guess I'll write to you in Sargonian from now on, then.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: ...So, um, Gavial, who are all these people?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Oh, this one's Dr. {@nickname}. Doctor, for short. Counts as my boss, I guess?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: And then the rest are all friends from work.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial's boss... are you actually stronger than her?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: So how'd you get to be Gavial's boss, then?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Gavial, this one looks pretty weak to me.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: No way!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I've got bigger problems, Tomimi. Zumama's people stole our aircraft engine after the crash. She's got minions now?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: What's an aircraft engine? Is it like one of those motory things? Wait, um... huh? Zumama?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: What about her?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Ah, um, Zumama's the chief of a tribe now. There's a lot of people who think she'll be the next Great Chief, too.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Aah... So that's how it is. Could've been her crew that took us down, too. She's the only one who was into those weird wacky gizmo weapons in the first place.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: ...Yeah, yeah! If you wanna find Zumama, the ceremony's starting tomorrow, and every aspiring Chief is gonna be at the Temple. Zumama'll be there for sure.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: So all we gotta do to find her is head there, huh? Ha! Perfect.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hey, didn't you say your cute little noggin wanted to compete for it too? Go on, show me how far you've come in all these years!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: (Quietly) I still want you to be the Chief, Gavial.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Huh? Whawazzat?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: N-Nothing!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Doctor, emergency maintenance has been completed. Are we setting off now?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Nice work, Lancet-2. Yeah, we're heading to the Temple next.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Wowww! The machine talks!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I like to think I'm ready for it, but it still hurts my heart a little whenever I get that sort of reaction. Not that I technically have a heart...
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Aircraft won't explode now, right?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: It won't, but it's not exactly ideal to just leave it here...
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Yeah, true. I don't want Kal'tsit giving me the death stare either.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I-If I send, um, some of my people out to take it back to my tribe, would that help?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Your tribe? Huh? Hell, I didn't realize. So our little girl's a full-grown clan leader now, huh?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes! It actually used to be your tribe, Gavial.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Well, damn. No wonder I recognized a couple of faces...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Oh, also! Gavial, we changed the tribe's name now! 'Wilderness's Will' is now 'Gavial's Will'!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Hah?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Because we all think you're the best, Gavial!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Uh—*cough* *cough*—okay, whatever. I'll leave you to it.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Did everyone get that?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Archosauria

attributes.content: Ah, in that case, I think Mr. Dylan and I will stay with the aircraft.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: I understand you're going to meet a large number of people. I would only cause problems if I went.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: And the aircraft does need guarding.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: What? You're not gonna go see the ceremony? It's a hell of a treat.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. I prefer the quieter side of things, anyway.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Suit yourself. I guess it'll be just me, the Doctor, and, uh, Kay going, then.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: And me! And I'll bring some of my people with us too!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Please wait a moment, Doctor. What about Kay?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: What's up, Doctor?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hm? Wait up. Where'd Kay go?!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Oh, huh. You're right, she was just here. Where'd that little rascal run off to?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: When you say Kay, do you mean the one jabbering away over there like she's half-possessed?
attributes.name: Archosauria

attributes.content: I'm not gonna let you hurt the Doctor, Reunion!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Nooo! Don't steal my honey biscuits! Get back here!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Kay appears to be fighting the air... Um, this could be a case of poison-induced hallucination.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Oh! Shit! I forgot to warn you! There's a hell of a lot of mushrooms and fruits growing wild along the road here, and more than most of them you can't eat. If you do, you end up like that.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Forgot the kid was even wilder than me. I bet she snuck off while we were busy talking and helped herself to the buffet.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Uh, damn it. Okay. Go tie her up and take her back with you, Lancet-2. She'll be fine after a while, probably.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Leave it to me~
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Oh, one last friendly reminder. Our surroundings are quite hot, but such environments are prone to drastic nighttime temperature swings. Please bring the necessary supplies with you.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Oh, nice catch. Doctor, Tomimi, you two make sure you grab what you need from the aircraft.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: It's a long way to the Temple from here, and the rainforest won't have anywhere decent to sleep. Get ready to spend the night in the open.
attributes.name: Gavial
